name: QB: The Final Showdown
description:
The final project for my Prototyping class!

  1. Not 100% perfect! I had to code this all myself and I am not a programmer so any slight bugs I am aware of but I only had a week to do this lol
  2. The music is NOT mine. I am not taking credit for it. The rightful creator is credited in the credit screen.
  3. The red enemies can be stomped on! So jump on their heads! If they touch you, you die!
  4. Enjoy!
